T.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, q.surveyid as sid from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid left join answers a on q.id = a.questionid
T.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, q.surveyid as sid from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid left join answers a on q.id = a.context
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, q.surveyid as sid from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid left join answers a on q.id = a.questionid and a.choiceid = c.id
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, q.surveyid as sid from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join answers a on q.id = a.questionid
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid

F.query: select a.choiceid, a.respondentid, a.surveyid, a.questionid, a.context, c.id as cid, q.surveyid as sid from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid join answers a on q.id = a.questionid and a.choiceid = c.id
F.pkList: choiceid, respondentid, surveyid, questionid, context, cid, sid
